reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2005, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed in the hotel on the way to Cote D'Azur. There's not much to do in the area, but it's a lovely place to crash during your Provence exploration. The food is unbelievable - it is a Relais Chateaux property and deserves it fully.
reviews.title: great all around

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2004, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in Jr Suite which was quite large, with a sitting room with fireplace, a mountain view, and very comfortable bed.
reviews.title: A real treat

reviews.text: The service is excellent, very friendly and elegant.
reviews.title: excellent food

likes.disliked: — lack of modern amenities and a shower
